meanings.definition: Relating to the study of trees.
meanings.sent1: The dendrologic research helped identify different types of trees in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Her dendrologic knowledge allowed her to recognize various tree species by their leaves.
meanings.sent3: The party was filled with dendrologic discussions about the best types of trees for landscaping.
meanings.sent4: His dendrologic expertise was like having a tree encyclopedia in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The dendrologic field trip made learning about trees exciting and hands-on.

meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the study of trees.
meanings.sent1: The dendrologic was called to assess the health of the old oak tree in the park.
meanings.sent2: As a dendrologic, she spent hours in the forest observing and documenting tree species.
meanings.sent3: The eccentric dendrologic had a pet parrot that could mimic the sounds of different trees.
meanings.sent4: In the world of trees, the dendrologic was a wise old oak.
meanings.sent5: The young dendrologic was eager to explore the Amazon rainforest and discover new tree species.
